title: Bloom's Taxonomy Pyramid
description: An interactive visualization of Bloom's Taxonomy showing the six cognitive levels (Remember, Understand, Apply, Analyze, Evaluate, Create) as a hierarchical pyramid with hover descriptions and click-through example learning objectives.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Education
Instructional Design
Learning Theory
learningObjectives: List the six levels of Bloom's Taxonomy in order
Explain the hierarchical relationship between cognitive levels
Identify appropriate action verbs for each level
Classify learning objectives by cognitive complexity

controls.description: Hover over pyramid levels to see descriptions and keywords
Click on levels to view example learning objectives

limitations: Does not show Knowledge Dimension (factual, conceptual, procedural, metacognitive)
